message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
Your offer was a bit too low for me. I'm proposing a more balanced split that reflects the fact that the value decreases for me over time.
Bob, time is money. My previous offer was already generous considering the inflation. I'm slightly adjusting it to encourage a swift resolution.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm proposing a completely even split. Take it or leave it, but the pot is only getting smaller for me.
